name: Neon_Turret_Bat_Hunter
description:
Controls:

Left mouse button , space - shoot

Right mouse button, R - reload

This is a tower defense action game.

Your goal is to shoot all enemies to protect your land. Challenge yourself to achieve the highest score! Please leave feedback below and follow my page.

Punch Deck

"Music: Punch Deck - "Rise" (CC BY 3.0)" "Created by: Aleh Zakharau twitter: @ZaharauAleh"
